title: E-Learning Platform
description: An interactive learning platform designed for students and educators, offering course management, video content, quizzes, and progress tracking.

title: Parking Management System
description: A modern web app that streamlines the process of managing vehicle entries, exits, and space allocation in parking facilities with real-time dashboard insights.

title: Fleet GPS Tracking
description: A real-time fleet tracking system that provides live location updates, trip history, and performance analytics using integrated GPS and server-side APIs.

title: Fox-Travel Website
description: A travel booking and exploration platform featuring destination guides, user reviews, and integrated booking services with a clean, user-friendly UI.

title: LTS Website
description: A sleek, responsive corporate website for showcasing services, testimonials, and company information with an emphasis on performance and accessibility.

title: CMS Dashboard
description: A content management system dashboard that enables users to manage pages, media, and roles with a customizable interface and backend integration.
